name: The Warriors Fight
description:
【To players】
As a producer who loves games, we always have a confused, now the pace of society is so fast that everyone is anxious. We cannot even concentrate for 5 minutes. Actually most of the games are very time-consuming. For the sense of achievement of games, many people forget the socializing in the real life, love, friendship, or even the family affections have been affected.
So the question is, what kind of games can make us enjoy the sheer joy of the games when time and energy are extremely limited? That's what we're striving for. We want to build a game for our family, for our kids. Let them enjoy the virtual world of the game, meanwhile, have a great feeling of real life in reality.
After thinking hard all night, our team determined the direction. The whole team ate takeaway and instant noodles for six month and finally the game came out! We've focused on the idle game which you can upgrade effortlessly. And, importantly, it's not too costly and not too grind. Although it is an idle game, but it is very playable.
